snippet: Teams from Russia, Ukraine and the International Red Cross began checking the convoy that is said to be carrying humanitarian aid.
abstract: Inspectors from Russia, Ukraine and the International Red Cross have begun checking convoys destined for eastern Ukraine to confirm that the vehicles are carrying humanitarian aid.
lead_paragraph: Teams from Russia, Ukraine and the International Red Cross began checking the convoy that is said to be carrying humanitarian aid.

headline.main: Inspection of Russian Trucks at Ukraine Border Begins

keywords.value: International Committee of the Red Cross
